properties.description: To extract the data for various DB2 databases

activities.name: LU-DB2_BPCS_Metadata
activities.description: This LU Metadata activity fetches required details for data extraction from orchestration and dataengg_extract table

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select
    om.application_name,
    om.dataset_name,
    ctrl.table_name,
    om.server_name,
    om.server_path as source_object_type,
    om.filename as dso_changelog_table,
    om.data_filename,
    om.container_name,
    om.archival_blob_name,
    om.stage_blob_name,
    om.blob_trigger_name,
    om.data_level,
    om.active_ind,
    om.parent_id,
    ctrl.dynamic_partition_ind,
    ctrl.partition_column,
    ctrl.incr_column_name,
    ctrl.last_incr_value
from dbo.khc_orchestration_metadata om inner join
( Select
    parent_id,
    table_name,
    dynamic_partition_ind,
    partition_column,
    where_clause,
    incr_column_name,
    last_incr_value
from dbo.khc_data_extract_control_table
) ctrl
on om.parent_id = ctrl.parent_id
where len(trim(om.server_name)) > 0
    and om.application_name in ('@{pipeline().parameters.application_name}')
  and om.adf_trigger_name in ('@{pipeline().parameters.adf_trigger_name}')
  and om.server_name IN ('LS_APAC_DB2_BPCS','LS_APAC_DWH_DB2','LS_APAC_INDO_DF_DB2','LS_APAC_EXPORT_DB2','LS_APAC_CN_DF_DB2','LS_APAC_NEA_DF_DB2','LS_APAC_ANZ_DWH_DB2_2', 'LS_APAC_NEA_DF_DB2_GCOE', 'LS_APAC_INDO_DF_DB2_GCOE')
  and om.data_level=2 and om.active_ind='y'

activities.description: For each entry in metadata performs data extraction from relevant databases
